entry.title: [GRA2/GRA3][Web Hosting] - CloudDB migrations
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 18, 00:00 UTC  -  Sep 15, 00:00 UTC

Aug 17, 20:08 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 18/08/2022 00:00 UTC
End time : 15/09/2022 00:00 UTC
Service impact : During this operation, our customers may experience an unavailability of 1 minute.
Service improvement : Within the framework of the continuous improvement of our services, we carry out an operation of migration of the databases from GRA1 to GRA3. The cluster impacted by this maintenance is: sql020 (GRA2). Containers will migrate to eu010 and eu011 (GRA3).
Please note that the current maintenance can take place 24/24.
